file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: light-saga  example order service API
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: 'http://light-saga.swagger.io/v1'
paths:
  /orders:
    post:
      summary: Create a new order
      operationId: addOrder
      requestBody:
        description: create a new order
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateOrderRequest'
      tags:
        - orders
      security:
        - order_auth:
            - 'read:order'
            - 'write:order'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreateOrderResponse'
        '201':
          description: Null response
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  '/orders/{orderId}':
    get:
      summary: get an order by order Id
      operationId: getOrderByOrderId
      tags:
        - orders
      parameters:
        - name: orderId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the order
          schema:
            type: string
      security:
        - order_auth:
            - 'read:odrer'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: order detail
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetOrderResponse'
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    order_auth:
      type: oauth2
      description: This API uses OAuth 2 with the client credential grant flow.
      flows:
        clientCredentials:
          tokenUrl: 'https://localhost:6882/token'
          scopes:
            'write:order': modify order
            'read:order': read order
  schemas:
    CreateOrderRequest:
      required:
        - customerId
        - orderTotal
      properties:
        customerId:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        orderTotal:
          type: string
    CreateOrderResponse:
      required:
        - orderId
      properties:
        orderId:
          type: string
    GetOrderResponse:
      required:
        - orderId
      properties:
        orderId:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        orderState:
          type: string
          enum:
            - PENDING
            - APPROVED
            - REJECTED          
    Error:
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/orders/{orderId}": at 1:1621: get: operation "getOrderByOrderId": at 1:1628: security: parse security scheme "order_auth": at 1:610: oauth2: at 1:696: flow "clientCredentials": at 1:717: unknown scope "read:odrer"
